text:
Determine if a set of points is a parallelogram using the distance formula

\left(\begin{array}{ccc}\ns(-2,1) & & -R(1,3) \\\n0 & 1 & 1 \\\n1 & 0 & 1(2,0) \\\nZ(-1,-2) & & & 0\n\end{array}\right)[imath]s(-2,1) & & -R(1,3) [/imath] [imath]0 & 1 & 1 [/imath] [imath]1 & 0 & 1(2,0) [/imath] [imath]Z(-1,-2) & & & 0[/imath]
